content.prompt: Complete the method given below: You must check to see if the index exists in the array:1. If the index is in range, then you will print out "The user's choice is: __", but fill in the blank with the element at the index2. If the index provided is "out of bounds" of the array arr, then you will print out "The user has no preferences"3. You will print out all the elements in the array in the output after checking the index. The numbers should be separated with a comma (the last element in the array does not include a comma).Example:if arr={3,7,90} and index=3 you must print:The user has no preferences3,7,90
